text: @GOPChairwoman @LindaSuhler @realDonaldTrump The Pres and his team need to keep doing the daily briefings so people can hear for themselves what is being done. It was comforting to hear the resources and private industry being mobilized bc the News will never tell you that. #CoronaVirus #DailyBriefing

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
